name: Icebolt
short_description:
What is Icebolt?

Icebolt is a free to use, intuitive operating system for run on your computer. Icebolt is based on Linux, and uses Visual Basic and other Microsoft tools to run. Icebolt is free to download from icebolt.tk/downloads, with no charge at any point; completely free forever :)


Why should I choose Icebolt?

1. Icebolt is free - It is completely free to use. No hidden charges or advertisements, just pure free; this means that you can test it out and see if you like it before you implement it fully into your system.
2. Icebolt does everything you need it to do - For the average everyday consumer, Icebolt provides tools such as an office suite and email handling program so that you can do everything you need to do. For more advanced users, Icebolt offers free programs that are easy to install, for you to do your video editing and audio editing easily, quickly and effectively at no cost to you whatsoever.
summary: Icebolt is a free to use, intuitive operating system.
